call_title: Ways to Bring Ergo to College Students | Reva and Henry | ErgoHack VIII

open_questions.question: What would be the best avenue to showcase Ergo's decentralized nature with 96% of tokens held by the public
open_questions.context: Discussing how to highlight Ergo's unique decentralization compared to other protocols

key_facts.fact: Both speakers are students at Cornell University
key_facts.speaker: Reva

key_facts.fact: Cornell has a rather large blockchain developer group
key_facts.speaker: Reva

key_facts.fact: Cornell runs an intro to blockchain course that is two credits taught every semester
key_facts.speaker: Reva

key_facts.fact: 96% of Ergo's tokens are held by the public
key_facts.speaker: Reva
